name: Validate findings response when scan ID is not found -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends GET request to fetch findings for scan ID "3412a2c5-127b-476c-b399-af68ee4aef00"
When the user receives the findings response
Then the status code returned should be 200 for successful findings retrieval
And the response should contain null "chatbot_id" and "chatbot_name"
And the "scan_id" in response should match "3412a2c5-127b-476c-b399-af68ee4aef00"
And the response should contain an empty list of findings

fullName: Get Findings by Scan ID using Genr3d API: Validate findings response when scan ID is not found

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Get Findings by Scan ID using Genr3d API
